Plot wind rose.

Source: R/plot_wind_rose.R
plot_windrose.Rd

Plot wind rose.

plot_windrose(
  data,
  spd,
  dir,
  spdres = 2,
  dirres = 30,
  spdmin = 0,
  spdmax = 20,
  spdseq = NULL,
  palette = "YlGnBu",
  countmax = NA
)

Arguments

data

data.frame.

spd

vector. Wind speed.

dir

vector. Wind direction.

spdres

integer. Resolution of wind speed scale.

dirres

integer. Resolution of wind direction scale.

spdmin

integer. Minimum of wind speed.

spdmax

integer. Maximum of wind speed.

spdseq

vector. Scale sequence for wind speed (missing, uses spdmin, spdmax and spdres)

palette

character. Palette for the wind speed.

countmax

integer. y-axis adjustments.

Value

a ggplot2 of the form of a wind rose

References

Code from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/17266780/wind-rose-with-ggplot-r
